mapper.select: SELECT B.board_no, B.board_title, B.board_content, m.member_id, DATE_FORMAT(B.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS reg_date, DATE_FORMAT(B.mod_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS mod_date FROM board B JOIN member m ON B.board_writer = m.member_no LIMIT #{limitPageNo},#{numPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (board_title, board_content, board_writer) VALUES (#{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardWriter})
INSERT INTO attach (board_no, ori_name, re_name) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{oriName}, #{reName})
